TopicTitle: Is there any way for this to be fixed/resolved?

Articles.Content:
Recently I have had trouble getting the loading bar to budge, as I tried it on my dad's HP Envy, which had 8 GB of ram. The loading bar(under the red underline) would not move so I  went to my brother and he said to try it on his Alienware PC, which had 128 GB of ram and 6 processors. The bar would not budge(On the Alienware, I have spent 20 minutes and it is still stuck).  This is the 2nd computer I have attempted on and both were working before just days earlier?

List of modules

ModuleManager

OPM, CTTP

Kopernicus

Waterfall

Parallax

CustomBarnKit
I uninstalled Waterfall and the problem is still happening.

We’re going to need to see the logs to get to the bottom of this, but at a guess I’d say you’ve got a corrupted installation. Try verifying the game files (if on Steam) or uninstalling and reinstalling the game.

Here’s how you get the log files and what to do with them:
